com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core

Class MleMediaRef

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core.MleMediaRef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMleMediaRef

    public class MleMediaRef
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMleMediaRef
    MleMediaRef is a class that manages references to media assets.

    This is the base class for all Magic Lantern media references.

    Use init() to initialize the media reference.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard
    See Also:
    MleMediaRef.MleMediaRefBuffer, MleMediaRefConverter

    • Method Detail

      • _mlCreateMleMediaRef

        public static MleMediaRef _mlCreateMleMediaRef()
        A factory method for creating a MediaRef.
        Returns:
        A new MleMediaRef is returned.

      • init

        public void init()
          throws MleRuntimeException
        Initialize the media reference.

        This method is a hook to do any initialization of the media reference. Typically, the media reference may schedule itself. The base init() function does nothing.

        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the media reference can not be successfully initialized.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
             throws MleRuntimeException
        Dispose all resources associated with the MediaRef.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the media reference can not be successfully disposed.

      • registerMedia

        public boolean registerMedia(long flags,
                             int size,
                             byte[] media)
        Register the media for this reference.

        This method is used to register the media data that is referenced.

        Parameters:
        flags - TBD
        size - The size of the media data to be registered.
        media - A byte array containing the media data.
        Returns:
        A boolean value will be returned depending on whether the media data has been successfully registered. true will be returned upon success. Otherwise, false will be returned.

      • clearRegistry

        public void clearRegistry()
        Clear the registry of media references.

        This method is used to unload the media data from the media registry.

      • getNextMediaRef

        public MleMediaRef.MleMediaRefBuffer getNextMediaRef(MleMediaRef.MleMediaRefBuffer loadReference)
        Get the next media reference relative to the specifed load reference.
        Parameters:
        loadReference - The MleMediaRefBuffer which marks the current media reference. May be null.
        Returns:
        A MleMediaRefBuffer is returned. If loadReference was specified as null, then the first MleMediaRefBuffer in the list will be returned.

      • getMediaRefFlags

        public int getMediaRefFlags(MleMediaRef.MleMediaRefBuffer loadReference)
                     throws MleRuntimeException
        Get the media reference flags for the specified load reference.
        Parameters:
        loadReference - The MleMediaRefBuffer which marks the current media reference.
        Returns:
        The flags will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified load reference is null.

      • getMediaRefBufferSize

        public int getMediaRefBufferSize(MleMediaRef.MleMediaRefBuffer loadReference)
                          throws MleRuntimeException
        Get the media reference size for the specified load reference.
        Parameters:
        loadReference - The MleMediaRefBuffer which marks the current media reference.
        Returns:
        The size will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified load reference is null.

      • getMediaRefBuffer

        public byte[] getMediaRefBuffer(MleMediaRef.MleMediaRefBuffer loadReference)
                         throws MleRuntimeException
        Get the media reference buffer for the specified load reference.
        Parameters:
        loadReference - The MleMediaRefBuffer which marks the current media reference.
        Returns:
        A byte array will be returned.
        Throws:
        MleRuntimeException - This exception is thrown if the specified load reference is null.

      • setMediaRefConverter

        public void setMediaRefConverter(MleMediaRefConverter converter)
        Set the reference converter.
        Parameters:
        converter - The media reference converter to set for this media reference.

      • getMediaRefConverter

        public MleMediaRefConverter getMediaRefConverter()
        Get the reference converter.
        Returns:
        A reference to a MleMediaRefConverter is returned. May be null.

      • deleteMediaRefConverter

        public void deleteMediaRefConverter()
        Remove the reference converter.
